James H. Gray, Adm’r vs. Amanda M. Basley and Trustee. Same vs. Ethel Basley and Trustee. Washington County. Decided November 15, 1923. *561J. E. Gray and Gray & Sawyer, for plaintiff. E. E. Saunders, Oscar L. Whalen and L. E. Newcomb, for defendants.
